name: Bread with Pasta
description:
Bread with pasta is my first game!. Collect pasta to survive! and becareful with ants at the night... . And trap them to survive and thrive!.

(Made in 2 days! for a personal Gamejam)

You are a bread, be a bread

controls :  up,right,left,down,Z,X

(Z = hold or pick)

(X = use)
